nodes.text: Deegles were small animals from Gentes.

These small beings inhabit the planet Gentes, relatively little is known about this creature but their courtship dances are a beautiful case to behold (and quite amusing): they stand on their two hind legs and jump, they win over the female who  from the highest jump.  A subspecies from the south of the planet shows a characteristic that the northern specimens do not present, those from the south are also blue, but they have red dots along their body.
